member.name: T:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.BlockStart
member.summary: Describes how to output the opening curly-brace for blocks when the OutputMode is set to MultipleLines

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.BlockStart.NewLine
F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.BlockStart.SameLine
F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.BlockStart.UseSource
member.summary: Output the opening curly-brace block-start character on the same line or a new line depending on how it was specified in the sources

member.summary: Configuration context extensions

member.summary: Configuration settings of Microsoft Ajax Minifier

member.summary: Gets a Microsoft Ajax Minifier configuration settings

member.name: T:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.CssMinifierSettings
member.summary: Configuration settings of Microsoft Ajax CSS minifier

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.CssMinifierSettings.ColorNames
member.summary: Gets or sets ColorNames setting

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.CssMinifierSettings.CommentMode
member.summary: Gets or sets CommentMode setting

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.CssMinifierSettings.MinifyExpressions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to minify the JS within expression functions

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.CssMinifierSettings.RemoveEmptyBlocks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether empty blocks removes the corresponding rule or directive

member.name: T:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings
member.summary: Configuration settings of Microsoft Ajax JS minifier

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.AlwaysEscapeNonAscii
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether to always escape non-ASCII characters as \uXXXX or to let the output encoding object handle that via the JsEncoderFallback object for the specified output encoding format

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.AmdSupport
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether to perform extra tasks on AMD-style defines

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.CollapseToLiteral
P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.ConstStatementsMozilla
P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.DebugLookupList
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representation of the list of debug lookups (comma-separated)

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.ErrorIfNotInlineSafe
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to throw an error if a source string is not safe for inclusion in an HTML inline script block

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.EvalLiteralExpressions
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to evaluate expressions containing only literal bool, string, numeric, or null values (true). Leave literal expressions alone and do not evaluate them (false).

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.EvalTreatment
member.summary: EvalTreatment setting

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.IgnoreConditionalCompilation
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether or not to ignore conditional-compilation comment syntax (true) or to try to retain the comments in the output (false)

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.IgnorePreprocessorDefines
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether or not to ignore preprocessor defines comment syntax (true) or to evaluate them (false)

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.InlineSafeStrings
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to break up string literals containing </script> so inline code won't break (true). Leave string literals as-is (false).

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.KnownGlobalNamesList
member.summary: Gets or sets the known global names list as a single comma-separated string

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.LocalRenaming
P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.MacSafariQuirks
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to add characters to the output to make sure Mac Safari bugs are not generated (true). Disregard potential Mac Safari bugs (false).

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.ManualRenamesProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether object property names with the specified "from" names will get renamed to the corresponding "to" names (true) when using the manual-rename feature, or left alone (false)

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.NoAutoRenameList
member.summary: Get or sets the no-automatic-renaming list as a single string of comma-separated identifiers

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.PreserveFunctionNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all function names must be preserved and remain as-named

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.PreserveImportantComments
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to preserve important comments in the output

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.QuoteObjectLiteralProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to always quote object literal property names

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.RemoveFunctionExpressionNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to remove unreferenced function expression names

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.RemoveUnneededCode
member.summary: Remove unneeded code, like uncalled local functions (true). Keep all code (false).

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.RenamePairs
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representation of all the indentifier replacements as a comma-separated list of "source=target" identifiers

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.ReorderScopeDeclarations
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to reorder function and variable declarations within scopes (true), or to leave the order as specified in the original source

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.ScriptVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets an enumeration that gives the parser a hint as to which version of EcmaScript standards to parse the source as

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.StrictMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether or not to force the input code into strict mode (can still specify strict-mode in the sources if this value is false)

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.JsMinifierSettings.StripDebugStatements
member.summary: Strip debug statements (true). Leave debug statements (false).

member.name: T:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MicrosoftAjaxSettings
member.summary: Common configuration settings of Microsoft Ajax Minifier

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MicrosoftAjaxSettings.CssMinifier
member.summary: Gets a configuration settings of Microsoft Ajax CSS minifier

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MicrosoftAjaxSettings.JsMinifier
member.summary: Gets a configuration settings of Microsoft Ajax JS minifier

member.name: T:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MinifierSettingsBase
member.summary: Configuration settings of minifier

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MinifierSettingsBase.AllowEmbeddedAspNetBlocks
member.summary: Gets or sets whether embedded ASP.NET blocks (<% %>) should be recognized and output as is

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MinifierSettingsBase.BlocksStartOnSameLine
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the opening curly brace for blocks is on its own line (NewLine) or on the same line as the preceding code (SameLine) or taking a hint from the source code position (UseSource). Only relevant when OutputMode is set to MultipleLines.

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MinifierSettingsBase.IgnoreAllErrors
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to ignore all errors found in the input code

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MinifierSettingsBase.IgnoreErrorList
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representation of the list of errors to ignore (comma-separated)

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MinifierSettingsBase.IndentSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a number of spaces per indent level when in MultipleLines output mode

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MinifierSettingsBase.LineBreakThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets a column position at which the line will be broken at the next available opportunity

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MinifierSettingsBase.OutputMode
P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MinifierSettingsBase.PreprocessorDefineList
member.summary: Gets or sets a string representation of the list of names defined for the preprocessor (comma-separated)

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MinifierSettingsBase.TermSemicolons
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag for whether to add a semicolon at the end of the parsed code

member.name: P:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.Configuration.MinifierSettingsBase.Severity
F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.CssColor.Strict
member.summary: Convert strict names to hex values if shorter; hex values to strict names if shorter. Leave all other color names or hex values as-specified.

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.CssColor.Hex
member.summary: Always use hex values; do not convert any hex values to color names

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.CssColor.Major
member.summary: Convert known hex values to major-browser color names if shorter; and known major-browser color names to hex if shorter

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.CssColor.NoSwap
member.summary: Don't swap names for hex or hex for names, whether or not one is shorter

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.CssComment.Important
member.summary: Remove all comments except those marked as important (//! or /*!)

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.CssComment.None
member.summary: Remove all source comments from the output

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.CssComment.All
member.summary: Keep all source comments in the output

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.CssComment.Hacks
member.summary: Remove all source comments except those for approved comment-based hacks

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.EvalTreatment.Ignore
member.summary: Ignore all eval statements. This assumes that code that is eval'd will not attempt to access any local variables or functions, as those variables and function may be renamed.

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.EvalTreatment.MakeImmediateSafe
member.summary: Assume any code that is eval'd will attempt to access local variables and functions declared in the same scope as the eval statement. This will turn off local variable and function renaming in any scope that contains an eval statement.

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.EvalTreatment.MakeAllSafe
member.summary: Assume that any local variable or function in any accessible scope chain may be referenced by code that is eval'd. This will turn off local variable and function renaming for all scopes that contain an eval statement, and all their parent scopes up the chain to the global scope.

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.LocalRenaming.KeepAll
member.summary: Keep all names; don't rename anything

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.LocalRenaming.KeepLocalizationVars
member.summary: Rename all local variables and functions that do not begin with "L_"

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.LocalRenaming.CrunchAll
member.summary: Rename all local variables and functions

member.name: T:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.MicrosoftAjaxParsingException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a parsing of asset code by Microsoft Ajax Minifier is failed

member.name: M:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.MicrosoftAjaxParsingException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.MicrosoftAjaxParsingException class with a specified error message
member.param: The message that describes the error

member.name: M:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.MicrosoftAjaxParsingException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.MicrosoftAjaxParsingException class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception
The exception that is the cause of the current exception

member.name: T:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.OutputMode
member.summary: Output mode setting

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.OutputMode.SingleLine
member.summary: Output the minified code on a single line for maximum minification. LineBreakThreshold may still break the single line into multiple lines at a syntactically correct point after the given line length is reached. Not easily human-readable.

member.name: F:BundleTransformer.MicrosoftAjax.OutputMode.MultipleLines
member.summary: Output the minified code on multiple lines to increase readability
